lessons.japanese: ピアニストとして、彼はわたしの遥か上を行く。
lessons.indonesian: As a pianist, he is far above me.

lessons.japanese: 恋の苦悩は他のあらゆる喜びよりも遥かに甘美である。
lessons.indonesian: Pains of love be sweeter far / Than all other pleasures are.

lessons.japanese: 恋の苦悩は他のあらゆる喜びよりも遥かに甘美である。
lessons.indonesian: The pain you go through because of love is by far sweeter than any other pleasure.

lessons.japanese: 恋の苦悩は他のあらゆる喜びよりも遥かに甘美である。
lessons.indonesian: The pain caused by love is much sweeter than any pleasure.

lessons.japanese: 彼女のしかめた顔は、他の乙女の微笑みより遥かに美しい。
lessons.indonesian: Her very frowns are fairer far than smiles of other maidens are.

lessons.japanese: 彼は遥かに時代を先んじていた。
lessons.indonesian: He was far in advance of his days.

lessons.japanese: 彼は普通の人より遥かに力が強い。
lessons.indonesian: His strength is much greater than that of an ordinary man.

lessons.japanese: 彼は私よりも遥かに流暢に英語を話すことが出来る。
lessons.indonesian: He can speak English much more fluently than I can.

lessons.japanese: 彼の講義は田中先生の講義よりも遥かに程度が高い。
lessons.indonesian: His lecture is far more difficult than Mr Tanaka's.

lessons.japanese: 鉄は金より遥かに役に立つ。
lessons.indonesian: Iron is much more useful than gold.

lessons.japanese: 受けた損傷は侮辱よりは遥かに早く忘れられる。
lessons.indonesian: An injury is much sooner forgotten than an insult.

lessons.japanese: 私の怒りは私がいだき続けた愛を遥かに上回るだろう。
lessons.indonesian: My wrath shall far exceed the love I ever bore.

lessons.japanese: 私の怒りは私がいだき続けた愛を遥かに上回るだろう。
lessons.indonesian: My wrath shall far exceed the love I ever bore.
